EN.summary: Junior Full Stack Developer with experience in Angular, Flutter, NestJS, MySQL, PostgreSQL, Firebase, and MongoDB. Knowledge in Object-Oriented Programming, Clean Architecture, and scalable modular architectures. Experience in designing and implementing REST and RESTful APIs with NestJS, developing npm libraries, documentation with Swagger, and API testing with Postman. Basic knowledge in Docker and experience in interface customization with Shopify, Liquid, and Canva.

education.studyTitle: Technical Bachelor's Degree with a Specialization in Graphic Design and Development.
Course in Web Design with HTML and JavaScript.

experience.description: Development of HTML5 and CSS instances for products on sales websites, editing internal code with Angular, Firebase with Kanban and Scrum methodologies, remote.

projects.description: Development of a professional portfolio using Angular to showcase personal projects and technical skills.
Development of a modular library workspace for reusable components and logic.

ES.summary: Desarrollador Full Stack Junior con experiencia en Angular, Flutter, NestJS, MySQL, PostgreSQL, Firebase y MongoDB. Conocimientos en Programación Orientada a Objetos, Arquitectura Limpia y arquitecturas modulares escalables. Experiencia en diseño e implementación de APIs REST y RESTful con NestJS, desarrollo de librerías npm, documentación con Swagger y pruebas con Postman. Conocimientos básicos en Docker y experiencia en personalización de interfaces con Shopify, Liquid y Canva.

projects.description: Desarrollo un portafolio profesional utilizando Angular para mostrar proyectos personales y habilidades técnicas.
